metadata.title: CVE-2024-38229 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Kestrel http/3 - When closing an HTTP/3 stream while application code iswriting to the response body, a race condition may lead to remote codeexecution.

criterions.comment: dotnet7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
